colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I TSOGS MCHOD DAM CAN ROL MTSO'I ZHES BYA BA 'DI NAS, BSRUNG MA 'DI NYID CHOS RIGS LA 'GO SHING STONG GROGS BYED PA'I RIGS SU SKYES PA DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO KHO THO K'O TA AER TE NI DAS CHEN DZA SAG TSE BSRUNG RDO @004A *, ,RJE'I PHUN NU THON MKHAN PI LEG THU CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL 'BYOR, TZENTA MA NI BI LIG THON T'A BLA MA DGE SLONG SKAL BZANG LEGS BSHAD, AER DE NI PI LIG THU THON DGE SLONG LHUN GRUB RGYA MTSO, TSE TSEN THON MGON PO RDO RJE SKU MCHAD BZHI KAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES KHA BTAGS MAndAL DANG BCAS PA NAN CHER BSKUL BA MDZAD PA LA BRTEN NAS, AER TE NI SHE JO BO'I RE KE THU BLA MA GLAGS PA DAR RGYAS SAM MING GZHAN DPAL MGON BZHAD PA RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS ^PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO'I @004B MDZAD PA'I LCAM SRING GI TSOGS MCHOD LA GZHIR BYAS TE, LCAGS BYA GRO BZHIN ZLA BA'I TSE GSUM DPAL GYI NYI MAR TZA SAG NYID KYI GRA TSANG BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RANG GI GAM DU NYE BAR GNAS SHING LAG GA-YOG TSUL BZHIN SGRUB CHU KHA LA PI LIG THU BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO , ,,)
